title: Mesa Verde National Park: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery               Photo Gallery                    Cultural Sites   16 Photos  Views of cliff dwellings and mesa top sites. The images in this album can be downloaded directly from the photo gallery. Most images are in JPEG format at 300 dpi. They may be used for private, public, or press use. Please credit "NPS Photo."          Luminaria Holiday Open House   4 Photos  Photos of lanterns and farolitos lighting up trails and cliff dwellings during past Luminaria Holiday Open House events. They may be used for private, public, or press use. Please credit "NPS Photo."          Selected Historic Photographs   6 Photos  Historical Photographs of Mesa Verde National Park. If you wish to obtain a high resolution  image from this album, please contact 970-529-5074.            Mesa Verde Wildlife   14 Photos  Images of wildlife at Mesa Verde National Park. The images in this album can be downloaded directly from the photo gallery. Most images are in JPEG format at 300 dpi. They may be used for private, public, or press use. Please credit "NPS Photo."
